item.title: Live updates: Trump, during Mideast trip, says a meeting with Putin is key to Russia-Ukraine talks
item.description: President Donald Trump stopped at al-Udeid Air Base — an important hub for the U.S. military in recent decades — before heading to Abu Dhabi.
